attribute.name: layout
attribute.description:
layout           | header | navigation | body  | footer
                =================|========|============|=======|========
                classic (Default)| top    | left       | right | bottom
                navigationRight  | top    | right      | left  | bottom
                upsideDown       | bottom | left       | right | top

attribute.name: headerClass
attribute.description: CSS class to be used for the table cell.

attribute.name: navigationClass
attribute.description: CSS class to be used for the table cell.

attribute.name: bodyClass
attribute.description: CSS class to be used for the table cell.

attribute.name: footerClass
attribute.description: CSS class to be used for the table cell.

attribute.name: headerStyle
attribute.description: CSS style to be used for the table cell.

attribute.name: navigationStyle
attribute.description: CSS style to be used for the table cell.

attribute.name: bodyStyle
attribute.description: CSS style to be used for the table cell.

attribute.name: footerStyle
attribute.description: CSS style to be used for the table cell.
